languages.text: "Чую кровь... и увековеченные страдания мон-кай! Быть может в этом все дело".

traits.locale_text: "Чую кровь... и увековеченные страдания мон-кай! Быть может в этом все доло".

languages.text: "I smell blood... And the immortalised suffering of mon-keigh! Perhaps this is the reason."
languages.original_text: "Чую кровь... и увековеченные страдания мон-кай! Быть может в этом все дело".

traits.locale_text: "I smell blood... And the immortalized suffering of mon-keigh! Perhaps this is the reason."
"I smell blood... And the immortalized suffering of the mon-keigh! Perhaps this is the reason."
"I smell blood... And the immortalized suffering of mon-keigh! Perhaps this is the reason."
"I smell blood... And the immortalised suffering of mon-keigh! Perhaps this is the reason."
"I smell blood... And the immortalised suffering of mon-keigh! Perhaps this is the reason."

languages.text: 「血の臭いがする…それからモン＝ケイの不滅の苦しみの臭いが！多分だが、これのせいだろう」
languages.original_text: "I smell blood... And the immortalised suffering of mon-keigh! Perhaps this is the reason."

traits.locale_text: 「血の臭いがする…それからモン＝ケイの不滅の苦しみの臭いが！多分だが、これのせいだろう」

languages.text: «Huelo a sangre... ¡y el sufrimiento inmortalizado de unos mon-keigh! Tal vez este sea el motivo».
languages.original_text: "I smell blood... And the immortalised suffering of mon-keigh! Perhaps this is the reason."

traits.locale_text: «Huelo a sangre... ¡y el sufrimiento inmortalizado de unos mon-keigh! Tal vez este sea el motivo».

languages.text: “我闻到了血腥味……还有猴子无穷无尽的痛苦！或许这就是原因所在。”
languages.original_text: "I smell blood... And the immortalised suffering of mon-keigh! Perhaps this is the reason."

traits.locale_text: “我闻到了血腥味……还有猴子无穷无尽的痛苦！或许这就是原因所在。”

languages.text: « Je perçois l'odeur du sang... et des relents de souffrance de mon-keigh ! Il y a peut-être un lien. »
languages.original_text: "I smell blood... And the immortalised suffering of mon-keigh! Perhaps this is the reason."

traits.locale_text: « Je perçois l'odeur du sang... et des relents de souffrance de mon-keigh ! Il y a peut-être un lien. »

languages.text: "Ich rieche Blut ... Und das unsterblich gemachte Leid von Chem-Pan-Sey! Vielleicht ist das der Grund."
languages.original_text: "I smell blood... And the immortalised suffering of mon-keigh! Perhaps this is the reason."

traits.locale_text: "Ich rieche Blut ... Und das unsterblich gemachte Leid von Chem-Pan-Sey! Vielleicht ist das der Grund."

languages.text: "Kan kokusu alıyorum... Bir de mon-keighlerin ebedî ızdırabının kokusunu! Belki de sebebi budur."
languages.original_text: "I smell blood... And the immortalised suffering of mon-keigh! Perhaps this is the reason."
